00073   // Token type for representing lexed chunks of text
00074   class Token {
00075   public:
00076     const char* prefix;
00077     const char* begin;
00078     const char* end;
00079 
00080     Token()
00081     : prefix(0), begin(0), end(0) { }
00082     Token(const char* b, const char* e)
00083     : prefix(b), begin(b), end(e) { }
00084     Token(const char* str)
00085     : prefix(str), begin(str), end(str + strlen(str)) { }
00086     Token(const char* p, const char* b, const char* e)
00087     : prefix(p), begin(b), end(e) { }
00088 
00089     size_t length()    const { return end - begin; }
00090     string ws_before() const { return string(prefix, begin); }
00091     string to_string() const { return string(begin, end); }
00092     string time_wspace() const {
00093       string str(to_string());
00094       string whitespaces(" \t\f\v\n\r");
00095       return str.erase(str.find_last_not_of(whitespaces)+1);
00096     }
00097 
00098     operator bool()   { return begin && end && begin >= end; }
00099     operator string() { return to_string(); }
00100 
00101     bool operator==(Token t)  { return to_string() == t.to_string(); }
00102   };
00103

00110
